data.title: Electromagnetic Counterpart Lightcurve Toolkit for AGN-Embedded BBH Mergers
data.name: chen-dai-2025-lightcurve-model
data.description: This code generates lightcurves based on the theoretical model of electromagnetic counterparts of BBH mergers embedded in AGN disks from Chen & Dai (2025), ApJ, 987, 214.

evidence: README install command: "pip install pagn numpy scipy matplotlib astropy tqdm"
"A Python package for modeling jet-head shock breakout emission from embedded black holes in supermassive black hole accretion disks"
Usage is via CLI commands like `python bbh_counterpart_cli.py generate-multiband-lc` and `find-best-lc`, producing CSV and PNG outputs for scientific analysis.
